roleset.name: request

example.name: transitive
example.text: USX announced in October that it was soliciting bids to sell TXO 's oil and gas reserves .

propbank.arg: bids to sell TXO 's oil and gas reserves

example.name: with arg2
example.text: After Mr. Ackerman announced he was soliciting consents from shareholders in order to wrest control of Datapoint from Mr. Edelman , the corporate raider purchased 30 % of Datapoint 's shares .

propbank.arg: in order to wrest control of Datapoint from Mr. Edelman

example.name: misplaced modifier
example.text: Hilton currently is soliciting bids for a sale of part or all of its hotel and casino businesses .

propbank.arg: for a sale of part or all of its hotel and casino businesses

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: The tender offer and consent solicitations to debtholders in December

roleset.note: SOLICIT-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus.. Comparison with 'request'. No VNcls. (from solicit.01-v)
SOLICITATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Comparion with solicit.01 and request. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from solicitation.01-n)
